game.name: GrandChase
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Co-op, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: ‘그랜드체이스’는 애니메이션풍의 비쥬얼을 가진 횡스크롤 온라인 액션 RPG 게임으로 기본 무료 입니다. 개성 있는 캐릭터들로 던전과 대전에서 시원한 액션을 즐겨 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Grand Chase is a free side-scrolling online action RPG with anime inspired graphics. Enjoy exciting adventures in dungeons and PvP with unique characters.

reviewHighlights.text: Don't waste your time playing this. I have played since the Beta, I played casually but almost every day so I could participate in events. My account...
I used to play the old Grand Chase long ago, and I noticed many fun and social features are missing from this version of the game. Not only that, but...
